name: Mindustryalization
author: Vortetty
description: a WIP mod for Mindustry designed for automation, it is currently op as it has items obtainable in the early game designed for late game (for testing purposes), however newer updates will make the blocks harder to research for balance. recipes may also become more expensive. mod is highly based around using light cubes (essentialy solid light, think Hard Light Bridges from portal 2) to build things. non-op version is availible with every release.
